desc: Rainbow Sounds™ produces High Purity Australian Quartz crystal singing bowls & accessories as well as provide workshops and sound training. Tuned from 432Hz scale to allow the best sound and vibrational healing and signature Finish (matt and smooth). Based in Gold Coast Queensland Australia. We ship worldwide.

layout.text: Learn and explore the magical world of crystal singing bowls! We offer beginner and intermediate workshops, as well as sound training for yoga teachers and wellness practitioners
